mcode Reference Model Version 1.0.0
shr.core

Element CostToBeneficiary

Documentation:

A suite of codes indicating the cost category and associated amount which have been detailed in the policy and may have been included on the health card. Alternate names include co-pay, deductible, exceptions.

Ancestors:
  • CostToBeneficiary
Used By:
  • Coverage

    • Field Summary

      Properties Defined Constraints Value
      Type

      A code describing the item at a greater level of detail.

      CostOrPercentage

      The amount due from the patient for the cost category.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      CostOrPercentage
      1..1
      Exception

      A suite of codes indicating exceptions or reductions to patient costs and their effective periods.
